item.title: Lecture 9: Calling variants I
item.description: We will call variants in three COVID-19 isolates using several variant calling tools. Go to Galaxy workshop site Create an account Import history from here](https://workshop.usegalaxy.org/u/anton/h/covid-19-data) This is the list of fields we will be extracting: CHROM POS REF ALT DP AF SB DP4 EFF[*].IMPACT EFF[*].FUNCLASS EFF[*].EFFECT EFF[*].GENE EFF[*].
